description:
在本剧的一开始，四个小美女在Emliy家的客房玩，突然暴风导致了停电，随着3OH!3的这首《Don't Trust Me》的音乐响起，谎言正式开始，歌词与剧名可谓是相得益彰。

歌词

I've got the breath of the last cigarette on my teeth.

我吸了最后一口香烟

And she's an actress' but she ain't got no need.

她是个女演员，她不需明白

She's got money from parents in a trust fund back east.

她的钱来自父母的信托基金

Tongues' always pressed to your cheeks.

我总喜欢亲吻你的脸颊

While my tounge is on the inside of some other girl's teeth.

当我和其他女孩接吻

Tell your boyfriend' if he says he's got beef'

告诉你的男友如果他准备了牛肉

That I'm a vegetarian' and I ain't f**king scared of him.

我是个素食主义者我并不害怕他

She wants to touch me wahoo.

她想接近我

She wants to love me wahoo.

她想爱上我

She'll never leave me wahoo' wahoo hoo hoo.

她将永不离开我

Don't trust a ho.

不要相信

Never trust a ho.

绝不相信

Won't trust a ho.

不想相信

'Cuz a ho won't trust me.

因为，不要相信我

She wants to touch me wahoo.

她想接近我

She wants to love me wahoo.

她想爱上我

She'll never leave me wahoo' wahoo hoo hoo.

她将永不离开我

Don't trust a ho.

不要相信

Never trust a ho.

绝不相信

Won't trust a ho.

不想相信

'Cuz a ho won't trust me.

因为，不要相信我

X's on the back of your hands'

你的手背上

Washed them in the bathroom to drink like the bands'

在浴室洗手，像乐队一样喝水

And the set list' you stole off the stage

你偷了列表离开舞台

Has red and purple lipstick all over the page.

这页上满是红色紫色的唇膏

Bruises cover your arms

你的手臂布满擦伤

Shaking in the fingers with the bottle in your palm'

拿着手中的瓶子晃动手指

And the best is' no one knows who you are.

最好没人知道你是谁

Just another girl alone at the bar.

仅仅另一个女孩独自在酒吧

She wants to touch me wahoo.

她想接近我

She wants to love me wahoo.

她想爱上我

She'll never leave me wahoo' wahoo hoo hoo.

她将永不离开我

Never trust a ho.

绝别相信

不想相信

'Cuz a ho won't trust me.

因为，不要相信我

她想接近我

She wants to love me wahoo.

她想爱上我

She'll never leave me wahoo' wahoo hoo hoo.

她将永不离开我

不要相信

Never trust a ho.

绝别相信

Won't trust a ho.

不想相信

'Cuz a ho won't trust me.

因为，不要相信我

Shush girl' shut your lips'

嘘，女孩别说话

Do the Helen Keller and talk with your hips.

像海伦凯勒一样，和自己交流

I said shush girl' shut your lips.

我说女孩闭上你的嘴

Do the Helen Keller and talk with your hips.
